name: Aberdeen
full_ticker_coverage: Our data maps to 1455 tickers today with the option to expand that.
full_sector_coverage: We monitor 13B ad supported page URLs per night, mapped to NLP keywords mapped to global addresses. We know which global business addresses are consuming what content each day
pricing_structure: $40k per month, 15% off for single payment.
why_us?: We can correlate online research behavior of addresses directly to stock price
advantages: Massive volume. Global. Technology can be steered to where you need to go. Tell us the tickers, the words, the sites you are worried about, the sites that show positive sentiment - et al. We can go all-you-can-eat, or assist with this steering to maximize correlation of online activity to stock price fluctuations.
use_cases: Prior to 9% Tesla stock price, we saw online research inside the walls of Tesla around "The Warn Act" about 60 day notice of layoffs. Prior to the AAPL 10% drop, we saw online research in China on negative sentiment about the iPhone X pricing.
